LanguageData.MedTimes_MealHeartyStew.label: 丰盛炖菜
LanguageData.MedTimes_MealHeartyStew.description: 丰盛美味的炖菜，由多种材料加上合适的火候烹煮而成。
LanguageData.MedTimes_MealWeakStew.label: 简单炖菜
LanguageData.MedTimes_MealWeakStew.description: 用少许材料烹制的一份简单的炖菜。
LanguageData.MedTimes_MealCheese.label: 奶酪
LanguageData.MedTimes_MealCheese.description: 奶酪是由奶制成的，是奶中的蛋白质凝结的意外产物。
LanguageData.MedTimes_MealJerkedMeats.label: 熏肉
LanguageData.MedTimes_MealJerkedMeats.description: 被熏干的可以长期储存的肉类。
LanguageData.MedTimes_MealDriedAgave.label: 龙舌兰干果
LanguageData.MedTimes_MealDriedAgave.description: 被熏干的可以长期储存的龙舌兰果。
LanguageData.MedTimes_MealDriedBerries.label: 煨浆果
LanguageData.MedTimes_MealDriedBerries.description: 被熏干的可以长期储存的多种浆果。
